parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results you wish to return

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A text string to search the assets data for

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: Return only assets associated with a specific order number

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specify the column name you wish to sort by

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Specify the order (asc or desc) you wish to order by on your sort column

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Whether to include detailed information on categories, etc (true) or just the text name (false)

location_id.description: ID number of the location the accessory is assigned to

manufacturer_id.description: ID number of the manufacturer for this accessory.

supplier_id.description: ID number of the supplier for this accessory
